alert.note: Alert for Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 11 at 12:23PM CDT until October 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 431 AND 437... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 431 AND 437... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 6 PM MDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 431 and 437. * WIND...West to northwest 25 to 35 with gusts to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 12 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
